meanings.definition: To make bourgeois or middle-class in values or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The new job opportunity will bourgeoisifies him by introducing him to a more affluent lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: Her decision to move to the upscale neighborhood will bourgeoisifies her social status.
meanings.sent3: His sudden love for caviar and champagne bourgeoisifies him overnight!
meanings.sent4: The extravagant party bourgeoisifies the otherwise simple gathering.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious mansion bourgeoisifies the entire street.
